org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.actions

类 Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.chaos.actions.Action
  • 直接已知子类:
    AddColumnAction, ChangeBloomFilterAction, ChangeCompressionAction, ChangeEncodingAction, ChangeSplitPolicyAction, ChangeVersionsAction, CompactMobAction, CompactRandomRegionOfTableAction, CompactTableAction, DecreaseMaxHFileSizeAction, DumpClusterStatusAction, FlushRandomRegionOfTableAction, FlushTableAction, ForceBalancerAction, MergeRandomAdjacentRegionsOfTableAction, MoveRandomRegionOfTableAction, MoveRegionsOfTableAction, RemoveColumnAction, RestartActionBaseAction, SnapshotTableAction, SplitAllRegionOfTableAction, SplitRandomRegionOfTableAction, TestChangeSplitPolicyAction, TruncateTableAction, UnbalanceKillAndRebalanceAction, UnbalanceRegionsAction

    public class Action
extends Object
    A (possibly mischievous) action that the ChaosMonkey can perform.

      • modifyAllTableColumns

        protected void modifyAllTableColumns(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName tableName,
                                     BiConsumer<String,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder> transform)
                              throws IOException
        Apply a transform to all columns in a given table. If there are no columns in a table or if the context is stopping does nothing.
        参数:
        tableName - the table to modify
        transform - the modification to perform. Callers will have the column name as a string and a column family builder available to them
        抛出:
        IOException

      • modifyAllTableColumns

        protected void modifyAllTableColumns(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName tableName,
                                     Consumer<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder> transform)
                              throws IOException
        Apply a transform to all columns in a given table. If there are no columns in a table or if the context is stopping does nothing.
        参数:
        tableName - the table to modify
        transform - the modification to perform on each column family descriptor builder
        抛出:
        IOException
